scott.title: A New Character
scott.description: Quick painting of a new character.

handsomejack.title: Handsome Jack
handsomejack.description: An illustration of Handsome Jack from the Borderlands series.

helloandwelcome.title: Hello and Welcome
helloandwelcome.description: An illustration of Aex from VACANT.

furiosa.title: Furiosa
furiosa.description: An illustration of Furiosa from Mad Max: Fury Road.

evelyna.title: Evelyna
evelyna.description: Illustration drawn of character Evelyna from VACANT. First it was sketched by pencil and then colored in Photoshop. This was drawn for it's Kickstarter a while back.

touche.title: Touche
touche.description: Illustration drawn of characters Rapture and Mourning from VACANT. First it was sketched by pencil and then colored in Photoshop. It took 13 days to complete.

hayren.title: Hayren
hayren.description: A picture of the first shipping ever in VACANT. This is Siren and Hayze. Their ship name is Hayren, and it was started by Elena.

illegalcover01.title: Illegal Issue 01 Cover
illegalcover01.description: Cover for a comic called Illegal written by Jeremy Whitley and drawn by Heather Nunnelly.

silentforest.title: Silent Forest
silentforest.description: Illustration painted in Photoshop for webcomic VACANT. The character in the foreground is named Siren, and the character in the background is named Reed. All characters belong to Heather Nunnelly.

imsorry.title: I'm Sorry
imsorry.description: Illustration of Bioshock Infinite characters DeWitt and Elizabeth. First, it was penciled and inked on bistrol paper, and then scanned to be shaded in Photoshop.

steppedinfrozen.title: Stepped In Frozen
steppedinfrozen.description: Illustration sketched in pencil and then colored in Photoshop. This was drawn for class. The assignment was to illustrate a concept design for a character in winter clothing.

obsessed.title: Obsessed
obsessed.description: Illustration sketched in pencil and then colored in Photoshop. This was drawn for class. The assignment was to illustrate a domestic act reinterpreted in a science fiction setting. I chose watching TV.

kneedeep.title: Knee Deep
kneedeep.description: Illustration sketched in pencil and then colored in Photoshop. This was drawn for class. The assignment was to illustrate a concept design for a snowy environment.

hayzeredborn.title: Hayze Redborn
hayzeredborn.description: Detailed character sheet of Hayze Redborn from VACANT.

thevirgin.title: The Virgin
thevirgin.description: A pin up done for Nick Marino's comic, Holy F*ck.

inceptioncoverentry.title: Inception Cover Entry
inceptioncoverentry.description: Illustration sketched in pencil and then water colored. This was drawn for the Inception Deviantart contest.

hayze.title: Hayze
hayze.description: Illustration drawn of character Hayze from VACANT. First it was sketched by pencil and then colored in Photoshop. This was drawn for it's Kickstarter a while back.

byyourwindow.title: By Your Window
byyourwindow.description: Illustration drawn for the Tomb Raider Deviantart contest. Was sketched by pencil and scanned to be colored in Photoshop. The character is Lara Croft.

monk.title: Monk
monk.description: Edwin Huang's character for his art book. Inks are by him. Pencils and colors are by me.

gunweilder.title: Gun Weilder
gunweilder.description: Emma from Illegal, a comic written by Jeremy Whitley and drawn by Heather Nunnelly.

vapor.title: Vapor
vapor.description: Illustration sketched in pencil and then colored in Photoshop. This was drawn for class. The assignment was to illustrate a book cover. This was later published on the cover of the book Muscle Memory.

madtogether.title: Mad Together
madtogether.description: Ellie and Riley from the video game The Last of Us produced by Naughty Dog.

crimsonsheets.title: Crimson Sheets
crimsonsheets.description: Illustration drawn of character Hayze from VACANT. First it was sketched by pencil and then colored in Photoshop.
